name: Baked Sweet Potato Wedges
author: Chris, Something About Sandwiches
ingredients: 1kg small sweet potatoes, scrubbed if needed
method: Divide potatoes into wedges (around 1/6th each). Skinnier wedges will crispy better.
Place wedges in cold water and soak for at least 30 mins, but the longer the better
Drain and thoroughly dry the wedges (important or they will steam in the oven!)
Place wedges in a large ziplock bag with cornstarch and toss to coat. Shake off excess. Add olive oil and seasonings to the bag and mix again to coat.
Space wedges out on a large baking tray on baking paper. Roast in oven for around 40 mins until crispy on the outside. Remove and toss with salt and pepper.
